p: City-level descriptive statistics are shown in Table 4. These were tabulated after grouping all census tracts by their respective city/municipality into 191 unique observations for each of the 16 years where SUHI intensity data are available. The mean yearly summertime SUHI intensity for all cities was 1.50 K with a maximum of 7.31 K and minimum of −2.61 K. D varied among cities with a mean of 0.38, a maximum of 0.63 and minimum of 0.08.
